channel.title: Diary Essays on bitdove's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Diary Essays on bitdove's Blog

item.title: Ready to Restart Life
item.description:
I have wasted so many times of my life, and now I decided to restart my life. Here are some plan.

Work

I still want to be a programmer or engineer.

  • C/C++
  • Go
  • Python
  • Linux

Life

I wish I can increase my weight for additional 5-6 kg, and more muscle.

Habits

I have a dream that I could master 4 languages, English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.

English and Chinese have learned a lot. I think it is the time to start Japanese.
